data.title: Taskwarrior Alternatives - Self Hosted Task management/To-do lists
data.meta_description: Taskwarrior is Free and Open Source Software that manages your TODO list from your command line. It is flexible, fast, efficient, and unobtrusive. It does its job then gets out of your way. Tags: Task management/To-do lists.
data.text:
Programming language: - - -

Taskwarrior alternatives and similar software solutions

Based on the "Task management/To-do lists" category.

Focalboard

9.5 5.7 Taskwarrior VS Focalboard

Focalboard is an open source, self-hosted alternative to Trello, Notion, and Asana.

Wekan

9.5 9.8 L4 Taskwarrior VS Wekan

The Open Source kanban (built with Meteor). Keep variable/table/field names camelCase. For translations, only add Pull Request changes to wekan/i18n/en.i18n.json , other translations are done at https://app.transifex.com/wekan/wekan only.

Blacksmith - Run GitHub Actions up to 2x faster at half the cost

Blacksmith runs your GitHub Actions substantially faster on modern gaming CPUs. Integrating Blacksmith is a one-line code change. Trusted by 100+ companies like GitBook and Slope.

blacksmith.sh

Kanboard

8.8 8.6 L4 Taskwarrior VS Kanboard

Kanban project management software

Planka

8.4 9.3 Taskwarrior VS Planka

The realtime kanban board for workgroups built with React and Redux.

Restyaboard

6.7 0.0 Taskwarrior VS Restyaboard

Trello like kanban board. Based on Restya platform.

Nullboard

6.6 5.3 Taskwarrior VS Nullboard

Nullboard is a minimalist kanban board, focused on compactness and readability.

Tracks

6.3 8.8 L2 Taskwarrior VS Tracks

Tracks is a GTDâ„¢ web application, built with Ruby on Rails

TaskBoard

6.1 0.0 Taskwarrior VS TaskBoard

A Kanban-inspired app for keeping track of things that need to get done. (Don't forget to read the Wiki page!)

sleek

5.5 8.8 Taskwarrior VS sleek

todo.txt manager for Linux, Windows and MacOS, free and open-source (FOSS)

scrumblr

5.2 0.0 Taskwarrior VS scrumblr

Collaborative Online Scrum Tool Using Websockets, Node.js, jQuery, and CSS3.

Tasks

4.5 0.0 Taskwarrior VS Tasks

A simplistic todo list manager written in Go

bulldog

2.9 0.0 L5 Taskwarrior VS bulldog

DISCONTINUED. HTML5 task manager, built on todo.txt.

Volition

2.7 0.0 L5 Taskwarrior VS Volition

DISCONTINUED. [Moved to: https://github.com/usevolition/volition]

Crepido

2.6 0.0 Taskwarrior VS Crepido

Create (kanban) boards to track users and projects from flat markdown files. Supports multiple projects, timers, progress bars, collapsible sections and custom colors.

tasks.php

2.3 0.0 Taskwarrior VS tasks.php

DISCONTINUED. A simple task/todo list manager.

Wheatbin

2.2 0.0 L4 Taskwarrior VS Wheatbin

Wheatbin is project management software that combines Kanban methodology with the Law of the Harvest.

omgnata

2.2 6.1 Taskwarrior VS omgnata

Self-hosted TODO list webapp.

todoMini

2.2 6.1 Taskwarrior VS todoMini

Self-hosted TODO list webapp.

todo

2.1 1.4 Taskwarrior VS todo

DISCONTINUED. todo is a simple self-hosted todo manager

Tinyissue

1.7 0.0 L4 Taskwarrior VS Tinyissue

Simple Issue Tracking for Teams

Kanbana

1.7 1.3 Taskwarrior VS Kanbana

Kanbana allows you to create boards to track users and projects from flat markdown files using Kanban boards.

Task Keeper

1.4 6.0 Taskwarrior VS Task Keeper

List editor for power users, backed by a self-hosted server

myTinyTodo

1.4 0.0 L4 Taskwarrior VS myTinyTodo

Fork from mytinytodo.net

tahskr-server

1.1 2.9 Taskwarrior VS tahskr-server

A simple, open source, self-hosted todo manager.

Vikunja

The to-do app to organize your life.

Taskord

Get things done socially with community of makers.

Taskfreak

A simple but efficient web based task manager written in PHP.

Do you think we are missing an alternative of Taskwarrior or a related project?

Add another 'Task management/To-do lists' Software solution
